src:
Lee County Sheriffs respond to reports of shooting at apartments in Fort Myers
04 Nov 2019, 23:26 by WFTX Digital Team



LCSO is responding to a shooting at the Lago Del Sol apartments in South Fort Myers. This is an ongoing investigation.





LEE COUNTY, Fla. — The Lee County Sheriffs has confirmed there was a shooting Monday night at Lago Del Sol apartments in South Fort Myers.
We cannot confirm if anyone is in custody or not at this time.



This is an ongoing investigation.
Count of Fox 4 to keep you updated with the latest information.
